pr_title: Enable programmatic security in SmallRye GraphQL endpoints

timeline.bodyText: We try to avoid star imports but as it's a test, I'll let it slide.
timeline.author: gsmet

timeline.bodyText: @stuartwdouglas could you check that one? Looks like a good backport candidate.
timeline.author: gsmet

timeline.bodyText: This should not be resolved per request, it should either be looked up in the constructor of cached in a volatile to improve performance.
timeline.author: stuartwdouglas

replies.bodyText:
I'm not quite sure how to do this.
I can't do that in the constructor, because that is called from a recorder, so Arc.container() doesn't work yet.
If I store it into a volatile variable, I need to be able to store null in some cases, in which case I won't be able to say whether the association is really null, or just not attempted to resolve yet, therefore I'll need to keep a boolean field somewhere to distinguish this, and check it every time, so the performance improvement might not be worth it anymore?
replies.author: jmartisk

replies.bodyText: You should be able to depend on BeanContainerBuildItem in your processor and then just pass the container into the recorder.
replies.author: stuartwdouglas
